dt: {bc}a light spongy food usually containing cream or gelatin
{bc}a molded chilled dessert made with sweetened and flavored whipped cream or egg whites and gelatin
{bc}a foamy preparation used in styling hair

et: French, literally, froth, moss, from Old French {it}mosse{/it}, of Germanic origin; akin to Old High German {it}mos{/it} moss {ma}{mat|moss|}{/ma}
shortdef: a light spongy food usually containing cream or gelatin
a molded chilled dessert made with sweetened and flavored whipped cream or egg whites and gelatin
a foamy preparation used in styling hair

dt: {bc}a fine sheer fabric (as of rayon) that resembles muslin
{bc}a sauce (such as hollandaise) to which whipped cream or beaten egg whites have been added

shortdef: a fine sheer fabric (as of rayon) that resembles muslin
a sauce (such as hollandaise) to which whipped cream or beaten egg whites have been added
